data.title: Zakat Al-Fitr
data.summary: Zakat Al-Fitr, embodies the spirit of generosity and solidarity within Islam. It’s a mandatory charitable donation given at the conclusion of Ramadan, symbolizing purification and support for the less fortunate.

featuredImage.alt: Individuals contributing to charitable causes as an essential part of their Eid al-Fitr celebrations

content.heading: Zakat Al-Fitr exemplifies the essence of charity and unity
content.description: Extend the blessings of Eid by sharing Zakat Al-Fitr, ensuring joy and fulfillment for the less fortunate. Your contribution creates a memorable and meaningful Eid for everyone.

content.heading: How is ARCD's Relief responding?
content.description: ARCD’s Relief ensures the proper collection and distribution of Zakat Al-Fitr to those in need, ensuring everyone partakes in the joyous Eid festivities.

content.heading: Your Generosity. Their Celebration
content.description: Your Zakat Al-Fitr donation directly supports disadvantaged families, providing them the means to celebrate Eid with joy and dignity.

featuredImage.alt: Completed school building in an African village, a result of Africa Relief's school-building initiative
Ruins of buildings in Morocco following a devastating earthquake, with rescue workers in action.

latestUpdates.title: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko Well

featuredImage.alt: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko on the well built by Africa Relief
